CustomField.description: The field stores previous OwnerId when Owner, whose Role is "sales_partner_ae_xx", is changed to the new Owner, whose Role is either “sales_partner_ae_xx” or ”sales_partner_am_xx” or ”sales_partner_sam_xx” or ”sales_partner_xx_xx_mgr” (which are the roles for AE,AM, SAM, or PE).
CustomField.label: Account Old Owner
